name: Pin Them! (Prototype)
description:
Pin Them (Prototype) was created in 48 hours during a PRODUKTIVKELLER Studios Game Jam. As we got lots of positive feedback we plan to make a full game out of it starting October 2021. Feel free to test it!

The version you can download here was slightly polished after the game jam by adding a volume slider, an in-game menu and fixing issues in the main menu.

Feedback

We would love to hear your opinion on Pin Them! You can give us feedback via the comments below. Or you can contact us on Twitter, Instagram and Reddit. Also feel free to follow us us for latest news.

Support

If you want to support us you can find us on Patreon and Ko-fi.

More Games

You can download all of our game jam games for free on our website: produktivkeller.com.
